entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 20.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
